com.versant.fund
Interface AttrBuilder

public interface AttrBuilder

An intermediate type used to define an index on an attribute when defining a class with attributes.

Example Usage: 

 SuperBuilder supers[] = {session.newSuperBuilder("Person")};
 AttrBuilder attrs[] =
 {
     session.newAttrBuilder(
     session.newAttrString ("description")),
     session.newAttrBuilder(
     session.newAttrFloat("GPA").withBTreeIndex()),
     session.newAttrBuilder(
     session.newAttrHandleArray("AllCourses"))
 };
 ClassHandle student = session.withSuperBuilders (supers)
                              .withAttrBuilders(attrs)
                              .defineClass("Student");

See Also:
Session.newAttrBuilder(Attr)

Method Summary
 AttrBuilder withBTreeIndex()
          Requests a B-Tree index on this attribute.
 AttrBuilder withHashIndex()
          Requests a Hash index on this attribute.
 

Method Detail
